title: Update main page typography to a more modern font

requirements.text: Update the app typography so the main page (route '/') uses a more modern sans-serif font family across headings, body text, buttons, and navigation, while keeping readability in both light and dark mode.

quotes: MUDE A FONTE DAS LETRAS DA PAGINA PRINCIPL PAR UMA FONTE MAIS MODERNA

acceptanceCriteria: A modern font is loaded in the app (via `frontend/index.html` and/or CSS) and applied through Tailwind (e.g., by configuring `fontFamily.sans` in `frontend/tailwind.config.js`).

The global base styles apply the new font to the `body` (in `frontend/src/index.css`) so text on the main page (`frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.tsx`) renders in the new font without requiring per-component overrides.
Key main page typography (e.g., the H1 'ROTAS E DIREITOS' and supporting paragraph) visually reflects the new modern font when previewed in the browser.
No changes are made to any immutable paths under `frontend/src/components/ui` or authentication hooks listed as immutable.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep backend architecture unchanged (single Motoko actor); no backend changes are required for typography updates.
nonGoals: Do not redesign layout, colors, or add new features beyond typography changes.
Do not change existing copy/wording as part of this request.
